notes_text: Private use and cultivation have been legal since September 2018.
notes: Private use and cultivation have been legal since September 2018.
notes_raw: {{main|Cannabis in South Africa}} Private use and cultivation have been legal since September 2018.<ref>{{cite web|url=https://ewn.co.za/2018/09/18/concourt-upholds-ruling-that-private-use-of-dagga-is-legal|title=ConCourt upholds ruling that private use of dagga is legal|first=Mia|last=Lindeque|access-date=18 September 2018|archive-date=30 June 2019|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20190630092912/https://ewn.co.za/2018/09/18/concourt-upholds-ruling-that-private-use-of-dagga-is-legal|url-status=live}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web|url=https://www.timeslive.co.za/news/south-africa/2018-09-18-ban-on-private-use-of-dagga-at-home-is-ruled-unconstitutional/|title=The highest court has spoken: You are allowed to smoke – and grow – dagga at home|website=TimesLIVE|date=18 September 2018 |access-date=18 September 2018|archive-date=27 November 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181127234223/https://www.timeslive.co.za/news/south-africa/2018-09-18-ban-on-private-use-of-dagga-at-home-is-ruled-unconstitutional/|url-status=live}}</ref><ref>{{cite news |date= 18 September 2018 |title= South Africa's highest court legalises cannabis use |url= https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-africa-45559954 |publisher= BBC News |access-date= 4 November 2021 |archive-date= 4 November 2021 |archive-url= https://web.archive.org/web/20211104002656/https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-africa-45559954 |url-status= live }}</ref><ref>{{cite news |last= Gwegwe |first= Siseko |date= 12 October 2021 |title= Cannabis weed in South Africa – What's legal and what's not? |url= https://www.thesouthafrican.com/news/cannabis-marijuana-weed-legal-status-in-south-africa-law-government/ |work= TheSouthAfrican.com |access-date= 4 November 2021 |archive-date= 4 November 2021 |archive-url= https://web.archive.org/web/20211104004200/https://www.thesouthafrican.com/news/cannabis-marijuana-weed-legal-status-in-south-africa-law-government/ |url-status= live }}</ref>
